title: Spanish police arrest 13 suspected members of Venezuela's Tren de Aragua gang
description: The arrests were made in five cities in the first operation in Spain to dismantle the Venezuelan prison gang.
content:

title: Unverified video shows Venezuelan F-16s in the sky after US B-52 Bombers fly near the coast, raising tensions in the Caribbean
description: US B-52 bombers conducted their fourth flight near Venezuela's coast in recent weeks, escalating regional tensions. These operations, part of a US-led anti-drug trafficking campaign, have prompted Venezuela to place its F-16 fighter jets on alert. Caracas views these military movements as provocative acts aimed at destabilizing President Maduro's government.
content:

title: Europeans largely skip Latin American summit under Donald Trump's shadow
description: Top European leadership is set to skip the EU-CELAC summit on Sunday marked by tensions between the United States and Colombia. Donald Trump is also pursuing an aggressive policy on Venezuela, with Nicolás Maduro in focus. Europeans cite low attendance to cancel summit participation.
content:

title: Se acabó el TPS para Venezuela: 600,000 venezolanos quedan en riesgo de deportación en Estados Unidos
description: Este sábado, 260,000 venezolanos con Estatus de Protección Temporal (TPS) bajo la designación de 2021 se despertaron sin ese beneficio migratorio. Una abogada y una activista reomiendan no acumular presencia indocumentada en Estados Unidos. | Noticias Univision Inmigración | Univision
content: Este sábado, más de 250,000 venezolanos que tenían Estatus de Protección Temporal (TPS) bajo la designación de 2021 se despertaron sin ese beneficio migratorio. Con ellos, son más de 600,000 ciudadanos de ese país que perdieron esa protección desde q... [6551 chars]
